title: Match History: CS Statistics
body:
Hey Guys, 

I would actually love to have a statistic, that shows how many CS I had over time.
The current Match History shows a lot of diagrams like champion Gold over time and so on.
But I would like to check after a game, how my CS was during early game / mid game / etc... 
Currently I think I can only check my CS at the end of the game, or am I missing any options, that I have not seen yet?

Thanks
